basics.name: Brittany Castillo
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently a student at EWU studying Visual Communication Design, striving to obtain a certificate in User Experience. I ran social media for a national branch of a nonprofit, designed an album cover for a local artist, and have been given multiple opportunities to photograph groups or individuals and do object photography.

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scoresâ„¢ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Contributes to creation of and works to implement annual Norlift marketing plan, and coordinates with staff for timely implementation
Monitors and analyzes industry marketing trends. Tracks, measures effectiveness, and reports Norlift marketing results
Creates and publishes content on Norlift websites blogs and social media sites with goal of driving traffic to the various Norlift websites and growing sales
Helps create and publish print advertising, including the Norlift newspaper, flyers, envelope stuffers, and in-house product signage, and all audio/video advertising

volunteer.summary: Take photos for the use of social media engagement or for support letter.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Brittany, her performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
